Reviews.Content: good deal We stayed here in 2006. Great service and for Japan the price was very reasonable for what you get. We would stay here again as everything is accessible by train.
Reviews.Author: minnowlam

Reviews.Content: Convenient location *I stayed in a twin room with my travelling partner for 5 nights. We came from Kyoto on the JR line and got off at Osaki station. You just have to walk across a pedestrian bridge and the Hotel is right there! Barely 2 minutes walk, even with bags.*So easy to get to any station on main JR loop line (eg: Tokyo, Shinjuku, Ueno).*The room had a view of river as well as good shutter to block out light in morning.*Standard toiletries in bathroom (shower/tub combo). Nice hot water and decent height.*Helpful front desk staff - they gave us maps, directions and once organised a taxi for us.*Didn't try breakfast (about $15).*100yen for 20-30mins on 2 (slow) computers in lobby.*Plenty of little eateries and fast food places right below hotel, including a big supermarket.
Reviews.Author: danzmerv
